logout.title: Sign Out?
logout.description: Are you sure you want to sign out from the admin dashboard?

system.title: System Settings
system.subtitle: Manage global configuration for your Glean instance.

registration.title: User Registration
registration.description: Control whether new users can sign up for an account. Existing users will still be able to log in.

embedding.title: Embedding Settings
embedding.subtitle: Configure vectorization for AI-powered recommendations.
embedding.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter new API key to update
embedding.progressDesc: Progress is derived from entry counts. Saving config will re-embed all entries.
embedding.downloadingModel: Note: First-time validation may take several minutes as the model needs to be downloaded from HuggingFace.
embedding.modelDownloadNotice: If this is your first time using this model, it may take several minutes to download from HuggingFace. Please be patient.
embedding.downloadTimeout: The validation will timeout after 10 minutes. If validation fails due to timeout, the model may still be downloading in the background.
embedding.modelDownloadTip: Tip: If the error is timeout-related, the model might still be downloading. Try again after a few minutes.
embedding.infoDesc: Vectorization enables AI-powered recommendations in the Smart view by generating embeddings for article content.
embedding.infoLocal: Sentence Transformers runs locally (no API key needed)
embedding.infoOpenAI: OpenAI requires an API key and incurs costs
embedding.infoRebuild: Changing provider or model will trigger a full rebuild

login.title: Glean Admin
login.subtitle: Sign in to manage your system
login.footer: Admin access only. Unauthorized access is prohibited.

entries.title: Entry Management
entries.subtitle: Manage and moderate all entries across feeds
entries.emptyFilter: No entries found matching your criteria
entries.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the entry from the database.

feeds.feedErrorDescription: This feed has encountered {{count}} consecutive error(s).
feeds.title: Feed Management
feeds.subtitle: Manage and monitor all RSS feeds
feeds.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this feed? This action cannot be undone.
feeds.emptyFiltered: No feeds found matching your criteria

users.title: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage user accounts and permissions
users.emptyFiltered: No users found matching your search
